appList.title: Tinder
appList.description:
Tinder is a fun way to connect with new and interesting people around you. Swipe right to Like or left to Pass on the people Tinder recommends. If someone likes you back, it’s a match! Chat with your matches and get to know them inside of Tinder. Tinder is FREE. 
Download now and see why over 6 billion matches and counting have been made on Tinder. 

Tinder in the press:

“The world’s hottest app” - Forbes
“Tinder solved online dating for women” - New York Magazine
“Tinder has become something of a cultural phenomenon” - TIME Magazine
“Tinder is perfect for women” - ELLE 

How Tinder works:

1. Tinder shows you interesting people you should meet. 
2. Swipe right to like and left to pass on each recommendation (your swipe is anonymous). 
3. If you like someone, and they like you back, you're both notified that it's a match! You can chat with your matches inside of Tinder.

----------------------------------------------------

Tinder is - and always will be - free. If you choose to unlock some new features with Tinder Plus, such as Passport (swipe anywhere in the world) and Rewind (bring back your last swipe), you can purchase optional Tinder Plus packages as an in-app purchase. If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus, payment will be charged to your Google account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to the Play Store app after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.
appList.what_is_new:
* Important bug fixes and improvements
* Introducing Verified Profiles: A verified badge on a profile indicates that the Tinder profile you’re viewing is really a notable public figure, celebrity or athlete.

appList.title: Zillow Real Estate & Rentals
appList.description:
You’re not just looking for a house. You’re looking for a place for your life to happen™. Zillow, the leading real estate marketplace, gives you access to homes for sale and for rent – plus more than a million listings you won’t find on an MLS. Search for a home near top-rated schools, explore neighborhoods and compare industry-exclusive Zestimate® home values. Make the home buying process easier: Get pre-approved and receive custom mortgage quotes from trusted lenders. Contact a local real estate agent when you’re ready to buy a house. Key Features:
• Browse single-family homes for sale, condos for sale, townhomes for sale and more in the U.S.
• Find rental listings for every type of property: single-family homes, apartments, townhomes, condos and more for rent.
• Get pre-approved for a loan and demonstrate that you’re a credible buyer to real estate agents and home sellers. Qualified buyers will receive an approval letter from a highly-rated lender within minutes.
• Search four ways: search from where you are (via GPS locator); type in an address; use voice search; or draw a custom region on the map.
• Find the right agent for you using Zillow’s Agent Finder. View agents with the most reviews, find an agent who is at home in your area and evaluate the most active agents based on their past sales and current listings. 
• For Android Wear users, use your watch to record a note for your favorite home, get directions to a property or find open houses nearby.
• Filter searches by price, beds, baths, property type, keywords and more.
• Get detailed ratings and reviews on public and private schools in your desired area. Use custom search tools to find homes based on school quality and their boundaries.
• See the Zestimate of any home in the U.S. and see Rent Zestimates (estimated monthly rental prices) on most homes and apartments.
• Claim your home to edit your home facts instantly and receive updates on your home and neighborhood.
• Coming Soon listings: Browse homes for sale before they’re officially listed on an MLS.
• Only on Zillow: Get FREE access to foreclosure real estate information across the nation.
• View foreclosure listings for sale in your area, including pre-foreclosures, foreclosure auctions and bank-owned properties.
• Save your favorite homes and searches, then view them on Zillow.com or any mobile device.
• Receive notifications when new listings hit the market, drop in price, show an open house date or are sold to stay on top of your home search.
• Access mortgage calculators, real-time mortgage rates and personalized loan quotes.
• Sign in with your Google account to avoid forgetting your user login.

For Real Estate Agents:
Sign in as an agent to start using exciting new features, including push notifications to instantly alert you of new contacts and auto-responder for quick and easy follow-up. Plus manage your listings, upload past home sales and request client reviews – all from your mobile device.

We love to hear from you! Please send any feedback or bug reports to the team at androidfeedback@zillow.com.
appList.what_is_new: We are always working hard to improve our apps. This is a small update to fix a few bugs, including a problem with notifications on tablets. Please continue to send your feedback to androidfeedback@zillow.com. We appreciate it.

appList.title: 7-Eleven, Inc.
appList.description:
Take the convenience of 7-Eleven everywhere you go with this new app. It puts savings in your pocket so every trip is more affordable, and rewards you for coming back so every trip is more enjoyable. INTRODUCING 7REWARDS(SM)
Imagine getting your favorite drinks for free. Now you can with 7RewardsSM. Buy 6 cups, and any 7th is FREE! Any cup, any size, your way, every day. 

Start earning 7Rewards today with three easy steps:
·      Download the 7-Eleven app to join.
·      Scan your app barcode at every checkout.
·      Any 7th cup is FREE! 

SCAN & SAVE
Your member barcode earns you free drinks and so much more. Scan it at checkout to redeem these exclusive offers on 7-Eleven and partner products. 

FIND YOUR FAVORITE STORE 
7-Eleven is always on your way. Find the store closest to your route or anywhere in the country, heart your favorites and find out which locations provide services like hot food, Redbox, gas and propane tanks. 

You can also use our Slurpee Finder to get your hands on your favorite flavor at a store nearby. 

GIVE FEEDBACK
"We’re here to make your everyday better. And we want to know if you think we’re doing a good job or not. Submit feedback in the form of a question, complaint or compliment at any time in the app."
appList.what_is_new: What's New Squashed some bugs. Read more

appList.title: Cartwheel by Target
appList.description:
Save on the things you already buy at Target with Cartwheel! Select from hundreds of discounts ranging from 5% to 50% off, and add them to your personalized Cartwheel barcode, all from the convenience of your smartphone. Then save on your next Target run by scanning your barcode at checkout in store. Use the discounts as many times as you like before they expire. You can even stack Cartwheel on top of your Target REDcard discount and other coupons! Don't have time to browse the app for deals before you shop? No problem! Just use the barcode scan feature found in the app menu to scan the barcode of any item in store and see if there is a Cartwheel offer for that item. If no offers are available, we'll show you similar deals. 

Add the barcode widget to your device for dependable access while in a Target store - never worry about connectivity problems again!

Unlock more spots on your Cartwheel list by earning badges. Find out more by visiting the Badges section in the app.

Curious which items are on Cartwheel AND the Target Weekly Ad at the same time? Check out the Weekly Ad Collection on the Collections screen.

Get started today by signing in with Target, Google+ or Facebook and instantly start seeing your savings add up!
appList.what_is_new: In version 1.8.2.2 of Cartwheel, we've enhanced the barcode scanner to be faster and recognize barcodes regardless of orientation. We've also made several bug fixes.

appList.title: Lucktastic
appList.description:
Lucktastic offers free scratch card games and real world winnings. With daily opportunities to win gift cards, prizes, and up to $5,000 in cash, it’s hard to lose out. 216,000+ winners — you could be next! Many additional features are on the way, so keep an eye out for even more prize winning opportunities!! 

★ Congratulations to our first $5,000.00 Cash Winner, Lupe B.!★
★ Congratulations to our most recent $777.00 Cash Winner, Cindy H. who won on 6/24/2015!★
★ Congratulations to our most recent $500.00 Cash Winner, Annette S. who won on 7/3/2015!★

♣︎ Win up to $5,000 instantly!
♣︎ Earn tokens & redeem them for movie tickets, gift cards, and more.
♣︎ Enter contests for fun prizes.
♣︎ Get great rewards from top brands just for playing.
♣︎ Always free. Always fun. No in-app purchases are required to play & win.

For all the latest news and even more winning opportunities, make sure to Like, Follow, and +1 Lucktastic!

For feature requests or feedback, write to us at support@lucktastic.com
USA only.

appList.title: Trulia Real Estate & Rentals
appList.description:
Finding homes for sale or apartments for rent has never been easier. Trulia’s top-rated real estate app instantly shows you a map of nearby homes for sale, open houses, or apartments for rent. With our simple-to-use filters, you can find real estate listings that match your specific search criteria. And with Trulia’s boards you can save, narrow, and share your favorite homes with friends, family, or by yourself to help in your home search. 

Easily browse basic real estate info, detailed housing listings, and open houses for homes for sale or homes for rent. Plus, quickly compare properties with vivid full-screen photos of homes and rentals, get real-time notifications about properties you've saved, receive instant alerts when new homes nearby hit the market, and gather local neighborhood info. Now optimized for your tablet and Android Wear, the Trulia Real Estate & Rentals App lets you keep up with your house hunt wherever you go. 

“One of the best Android apps for finding a house to buy, place to rent or to simply browse local real estate information." – Best Android Apps Review

Stay on top of your real estate home search with the Trulia.

Note: Trulia Real Estate & Rentals only provides housing listings in the US at this time.

Key Features:
✓ NEW! Boards: the simple way to organize, narrow, and share your favorite homes.
✓ NEW! Voice Search: You can now ask Google to search for homes on Trulia using nothing but your voice.
✓ Instant Maps: Using built-in GPS, see nearby homes for sale, houses for rent, apartments for rent, or recently sold homes.
✓ Nearby Home Alerts: Get instantly alerted when homes near your current location hit the market.
✓ Android Wear Compatibility: Get nearby home alerts, view property details and photos, or contact the realtor — all from your watch. 
✓ Open Houses: Find open houses for sale near you, and easily add them to your calendar.
✓ Custom Searches: Filter your search by price, lot size, number of bedrooms and bathrooms, neighborhood, and more. 
✓ Keyword Searches: Search for listings using keywords or MLS numbers.
✓ Photo slideshows: View slideshows of homes, condos, townhomes, apartments and more.
✓ Instant Updates: Get notified immediately when new home listings come up in your favorite areas or there are updates to your saved homes.
✓ Local Scoop: See school ratings and nearby amenities like restaurants, grocery stores, gas stations, and more.
✓ Crime Maps: See a crime map of any neighborhood in the US.
✓ Map Modes: View a map area in normal, satellite or terrain mode. 
✓ Mortgage Calculator: Get personalized rates and calculate your mortgage.
✓ Affordability Breakdown: Calculate the full cost of owning your dream home, including mortgage, homeowner’s insurance, and property taxes.
✓ Cross-device Access: Log in to access your favorite searches and properties across all your devices.
✓ Connect w/Realtors: Quickly contact relevant real estate agents about listings.
✓ Directions: Get directions to open houses, homes for sale, or apartments for rent.
✓ Trulia Widget: See new homes for sale, right from your home screen.
✓ Samsung Air View: Hover your finger - or S-pen - on a property listing to see property details (only available on Samsung GALAXY Note I, Note II, Note 8.0 and 10.1, and Samsung GALAXY S4).

We'd love to hear your feedback! Email us anytime: android@trulia.com
appList.what_is_new:
If you’ve got an Android Wear, this update is for you. We’re introducing the ability find nearby homes by interacting with maps. When you click on any of the homes, you’ll get all the info you need: full-screen photos, home details, and even local data like school ratings and crime rates.
Tip: Trulia will keep you in the know when new homes come on the market that meet your criteria. Save a search to get started.
Keep the feedback coming! Email us anytime at android@trulia.com.

appList.title: Starbucks
appList.description:
The Starbucks® app for Android® is the quickest, most convenient way to pay for your coffee—no wallet necessary. The app provides easy access to your Starbucks Card and the My Starbucks Rewards® loyalty program. 
· Pay: Use your phone to pay at 7,000 Starbucks® stores and 2,500 Target and Safeway Starbucks® locations in the U.S.; 1,000 Starbucks® stores in Canada; and 700 Starbucks® stores in the U.K.
· Manage your Starbucks Card: Check your balance, reload, view your transaction history and transfer balances between cards. 
· Tipping: Leave a digital tip on purchases (US and Canada)
· Rewards: Register for My Starbucks Rewards® or manage your existing account. Earn Stars with each payment, track them and redeem your Rewards.
· Store Locator: Find the stores nearest you, directions, hours and amenities.
· Gift: Send Starbucks eGift Cards for special occasions, or just because (US, Canada and UK).

Known Technical Limitations
• This application supports US, UK & Canada Starbucks Cards only, including Gold cards
- Starbucks® app for Android™runs on Android v4.1 (“Jelly Bean”) or higher
• Starbucks® Store Credit Cards or Duetto Cards are not supported
• Starbucks® app for Android™ supports your personal Starbucks Cards. Cards may only be loaded onto one device at a time. If you wish to reload a friend or family member’s Starbucks Card, please visit Starbucks.com/card.

For more information, please visit http://www.starbucks.com/coffeehouse/mobile-apps/
appList.what_is_new:
V3.1.1
Seamless eGift redemption. Including support for UK/CA eGift purchases.
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

appList.title: Realtor.com Real Estate, Homes
appList.description:
Find your next home from the comfort of your phone with the realtor.com real estate app for homes for sale and apartments for rent. Realtor.com is the only app to get real estate property listings sourced directly from over 800 MLSs-90% of listings refreshed every 15 minutes. If you like the app, please share with your friends and leave a review on the Google Play App Store. - Realtor.com listed as one of the best apps for house and apartment hunting - Apps Gone Free 2014
- "Makes searching for homes with schooling in mind a little bit easier..." --James Zahn, The Rock Father
- "Great schools in the area? Now you're talking a parent's language" --Terrence Gaines, PCMag.com

Why realtor.com®?
• 90% of listings updated every 15 minutes. All the rest updated at least once a day.
• Quickly swipe to see rich and detailed photos of real estate properties, apartments for rent and homes for rent that interest you.
• The only true search of homes for sale and rent by school or school district - make sure your next house is near your dream school!
• Property listing details now include property tax, sales history and more school information including ratings for each house.
• Draw your own custom search area right on the map!
• Search nearby schools, homes for sale, open houses, recently sold homes, apartments for rent, and houses for rent with just one tap.
• Use Area Scout to see results and average values update as you move.
• Stay updated on the true status of real estate and apartment listings, including foreclosures, just taken off market, and price-reduced homes for sale.
• Sign-in to save searches and listings. Access them again on your mobile phone or online at www.realtor.com.

Find your home on the go with the realtor.com® Real Estate App. 

For real estate agents:
•Connect and search with your clients!

Learn more at http://marketing.realtor.com/collaborate

Come hang with us!
http://twitter.com/REALTORdotcom
http://www.facebook.com/realtor.com
Have feedback? Email us at androidsupport@realtor.com
appList.what_is_new: What's New What’s New? + Optimized option to contact rental listings + Get notified when there is a price change + Have feedback? Rate, review or email us at androidfeedback@realtor.com. Stay on top of the housing market with real estate in real time. Find homes for sale and rent with the realtor.com® app in your pocket. Read more

appList.title: Family Locator
appList.description:
Family Locator by Life360 simplifies life in the digital world by making it easy to stay connected to the people who matter most. With Life360 you can: 
• Create your own groups, called “Circles,” of loved ones, friends, teammates -- whoever matters most and chat with them in Family Locator for FREE.
• View the real-time location of Circle Members on a private family map that’s only visible on Family Locator
• Receive real-time alerts when Circle Members arrive at or leave destinations (Eliminate disruptive “Where are you?” texts)
• Track stolen phones or lost phones 
• Enjoy a more diverse array of features and benefits than those found on T-Mobile Familywhere, Sprint Family Locator, Verizon Family Locator or AT&T Familymap.
• Use Family Tracker’s state-of-the-art GPS tracking technology for directions to favorite locations from wherever you are.

Family Tracker Offers Real Time Location Data
“I would recommend this App to anybody…Thanks for the personal touch, it makes me feel more comfortable in this day and age.” – Family Locator User Scott Tatum. Plan your next family gathering with family tracker and end multiple texts to learn everyone’s estimated arrival time. Family tracker alerts you when family members have checked in at a location and thanks to GPS Tracking technology, family tracker can also advise if someone is running late. 

GPS Tracking of All Circle Members (Even Those Without Smart Phones)
For time-sensitive communication, Family Locator can quickly pinpoint the location of every family member. GPS Tracking for non-smartphone users is also possible, for a small monthly fee. This knowledge is quite handy for party planning: use GPS Tracking to make sure all guests have arrived before the guest of honor shows up at the surprise party! Family Loctor also saves your most commonly visited locations and can provide directions to them quickly (thank you Family Locator!).

The best GPS Tracking App
This handy, easy-to-use app leverages the latest technology to help you stay connected in real time to the people (and the devices) that matter most. Life360’s Family Locator GPS Tracking functions, features and benefits include:

GPS Tracking to find Friends and Family. 
Life360 GPS tracking app uses GPS coordinates and state-of-the-art GPS location data to report the real-time whereabouts of your friends and family. Simply install the Life360 Family Locator app on your phone and your families’ phones. Once registered, each member appears as a unique icon on the GPS tracking navigational map so you’ll know exactly where each family members is, at all times. No need to send annoying “Where are your?” or “What’s your ETA?” texts, the Life360 Family Locator puts this information at your fingertips. And to make life super easy, we send you GPS tracking alerts the moment your friends arrive at the appointed location! 

Reliable Cell Phone Tracker 
The Life360 family Locator is a very reliable Cell Phone Tracker. It can pinpoint the location of registered mobile devices, smart phones and even old school feature phones via the app’s website, 24/7. Our GPS Phone Tracker lets you locate Android Phones, iPhones and Windows Phones. Its easy to use. All you have to do is invite your family members or friends and you can start tracking them on your Phone to track any cell phone. 

Phone Tracking for Family Members With Feature Phones 
Family members who don’t have the latest smart phone (or a smart phone at all), can still enjoy our GPS tracking features and benefits. Here’s how it works: The app will send a text invite to the feature phone. Once your family member accepts the invitation and replies with a “yes,” to the text, their individual icon will appear on the app’s GPS maps. If their phone is lost, the app will provide GPS navigation assistance to help you guide them its destination. It’s a phone tracker extraordinaire. To track a feature phone you will require a premium membership.
appList.what_is_new:
Hey everyone! Life360 is now faster and smoother.
- A simplified design to easily locate everyone on the map
- Improved background location
- Fixed a bug with read messages coming back
- Other small improvements
To all the recent graduates out there — CONGRATULATIONS!
